title: [K-12] Advanced Language Learning Design Using AR-Based Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with foundational Chinese characters and language learning, along with basic digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Social studies-integrated language learning utilizing AR technology in limited smartphone environments

learning_goals: Learners can self-generate explanations of the meaning, composition, and usage of 50 Chinese characters using AR technology

Learners form teams of three peers on a gamification platform (e.g., Kahoot!, Minecraft Education Edition) and complete three language application tasks (role-play, digital storytelling, quiz creation) within one week, meeting the following conditions: ① selecting one of Korean/Japanese/Mexican cultures ② achieving at least 3 out of 5 points on the rubric for each task.
Learners can write self-reflection reports based on digital portfolios generated during AR learning processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
